Monster_Type.Name: Humanoid
Monster_Type.Description: A creature shaped generally like a human of Small or Medium size.

Monster_Type.Name: Aberration
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that has a bizarre anatomy, strange abilities, an alien mindset, or any combination of the three.

Monster_Type.Name: Beast
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is a fantastic, but not necessarily magical, vertebrate.

Monster_Type.Name: Monstrosity
Monster_Type.Description: A frightening creature that is not ordinary, not truly natural, and almost never benign.

Monster_Type.Name: Construct
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is either an animated object, or an artificially constructed creature.

Monster_Type.Name: Fiend
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is a malicious, otherworldly entity.

Monster_Type.Name: Elemental
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is composed of one of the four classical elements: air, earth, fire, and water.

Monster_Type.Name: Undead
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that was once-living but has now been animated by spiritual or supernatural forces.

Monster_Type.Name: Celestial
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is an outsider of wholly good alignment.

Monster_Type.Name: Giant
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is a humanoid-shaped entity of great strength and size.

Monster_Type.Name: Fey
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is a humanoid in form and generally has a supernatural ability and a connection to nature.

Monster_Type.Name: Plant
Monster_Type.Description: A creature composed of vegetable material, but unlike normal plants these monsters may be carnivorous, intelligent, mobile, or any combination of the three.

Monster_Type.Name: Dragon
Monster_Type.Description: A creature that is reptilelike, usually winged, with magical or unusual abilities.
